tests.title: only seller and admin can edit or delete product
tests.fullTitle: Page /products/:productId only seller and admin can edit or delete product

tests.title: product edition button
product deletion button
admin can delete bid
bidder can delete bid
not bidder cannot delete bid
tests.fullTitle: Page /products/:productId not bidder cannot delete bid

tests.title: bid deletion button
only seller cannot add a bid
tests.fullTitle: Page /products/:productId only seller cannot add a bid

tests.title: require minimum bid amount
preset minimum bid amount
